function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased temperature difference between city and rural areas due to urban heat island effect","Impact":"Exposure to increasing temperatures and heat waves leading to health risks","Mitigation":"Maintaining and expanding urban green infrastructure","Technologies":"Green building design, vegetated roofs, green walls","People":"Urban population, elderly, sick, people working from home","Owner":"City planners, architects, developers"},{"Description":"Impact of heat waves on mortality rate","Impact":"Increased mortality during heat waves","Mitigation":"Early warning systems, cooling centers, urban green infrastructure","Technologies":"Weather monitoring systems, cooling technology, urban green spaces","People":"General population, elderly, sick, people working from home","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence of vulnerable populations on building and open space quality","Impact":"Decreased quality of life, health, and well-being for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Consideration of needs for urban green infrastructure and building quality","Technologies":"Green building materials, accessible open spaces, nature-based solutions","People":"Elderly, sick, people working from home, care responsibilities","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building developers, caretakers"}]}
